messages.subject: Maeda-clan
messages.msgSnippet: Good evening from Sweden!My name is Andreas and i m an avid hobby painter. I m planning a diorama and need help with the colours of the Maeda- clans
messages.messageBody:
Good evening from Sweden!My name is Andreas and i'm an avid hobby
painter. I'm planning a diorama and need help with the colours of the
Maeda- clans 'uniform',i.e. do, hakama, kimono.Any additional
information on samurai dress-code,warfare, and so on would also be
very welcome! Thank you in advance! A.
